    • Method Detail

      • invokeAsync

        <T> org.springframework.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T> invokeAsync(Callable<org.springframework.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<T>> callable)
                                                                 throws Exception
        Wraps a Callable in some fashion.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The return value for a future call
        Parameters:
        callable - the service call to wrap
        Returns:
        ListenableFuture of whatever callable would normally return
        Throws:
        Exception - because it's part of the Callable.call() method signature. Exceptions must be handled in the callback methods.
